1370: Gherbrandus was born in Breestraat in 1370.
Got married to Sara at age 33 in 1370.
Had a daughter with Sara, Reymodis, at age 33.
1371: Had a son with Sara, Lotijn, at age 34.
1372: Had a daughter with Sara, Riet, at age 35.
Lost daughter Reymodis when Reymodis was 3 years old.
1375: Had a daughter with Sara, Woltwigis, at age 38.
1377: Had a son with Sara, Alem, at age 40.
Lost daughter Woltwigis when Woltwigis was 3 years old.
1378: Had a daughter with Sara, Liudburgis, at age 41.
1380: Had a daughter with Sara, Aue, at age 43.
Lost daughter Aue when Aue was 1 years old.
Has seen several of their children die.
1381: Had a daughter with Sara, Heylewigis, at age 44.
